comments:
Build id: I20050927-0800

I have several Java editors open, plus an editor open on a revision in the CVS
repository (presumably an IStorageEditorInput).  When I make the CVS file the
active editor, and then hit Ctrl+W to close it, I get an NPE.  This is
reproducible for me.  The full log is attached, but here is the top of the stack:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.jface.text.contentassist.ContentAssistant.fireSessionEndEvent(ContentAssistant.java:1953)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.text.contentassist.CompletionProposalPopup.hide(CompletionProposalPopup.java:771)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.text.contentassist.ContentAssistant.hide(ContentAssistant.java:1794)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.text.contentassist.ContentAssistant.uninstall(ContentAssistant.java:1170)
fixed by adding a null check.
